About

I currenty work for MyJobMatcher as a Front End Engineer. My daily work involves building apps focussed on matching users to their perfect job as well helping recruiters find relevant hires. Additionally I am involved with development on internal tools.

Portfolio

I have worked on a number of Front End projects in an agency environment, for brands such as, Agent Provocateur, Polarn O Pyret, Bauhaus, Nokia, Toyota, Jaguar LandRover, Honda, Nissan, L'Or√©al, Lexus, & Yamaha.

Tools of the trade

I try and stay up to date with the ever changing front end techniques and technologies. My current favorite tech stack would include React, Node, Sass, Webpack, ES6.
